thread.title: Los Angeles Dodgers agree to deal with Franklin Gutierrez
thread.title_full: Los Angeles Dodgers agree to deal with Franklin Gutierrez

title: Los Angeles Dodgers agree to deal with Franklin Gutierrez
text:
Los Angeles Dodgers agree to deal with Franklin Gutierrez The Los Angeles Dodgers agreed to terms with free agent Franklin Gutierrez. Slot to 247Sports Links 
The Los Angeles Dodgers have come to terms on a deal with veteran outfielder Franklin Gutierrez. 
Gutierrez will sign a one-year, $2.6 million contract with the Dodgers. The contract also contains $400,000 in incentives, per ESPN . 
The outfielder has played 11 MLB seasons, the last seven with the Seattle Mariners. He hit .246 with 14 home runs and 39 RBIs in 98 games during the 2016 campaign. In 11 seasons, Gutierrez has hit .257 with 96 home runs, 353 RBIs and 78 stolen bases. Author
